title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle extend Netflix deal
description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle extended their deal with Netflix to continue producing films and television shows for the streaming service. The couple’s 2020 deal with Netflix was set to expire later this year.
content:
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle extended their deal with Netflix to continue producing films and television shows for the streaming service. The couple’s 2020 deal with Netflix was set to expire later this year.

Taylor Swift announced her newest album "The Life of a Showgirl" on Travis and Jason Kelce's podcast "New Heights." CNN's Lisa France reports that the announcement could reveal hints about the future of Travis and Taylor's relationship.

Dashcam video from the Mount Pleasant Police Department shows a lightning strike near an intersection in South Carolina. Hundreds lost power, and no injuries were reported, according to officials.

Singer, dancer and actress Jennifer Lopez was performing in Almaty, Kazakhstan when an uninvited guest joined her on stage. She casually dismissed the intruder, a long-legged insect, and thanked her fans.

The World's Ugliest Dog Contest named Petunia, a hairless bulldog, the winner of this year's competition in California on Friday. The prize was $5,000 and a merchandise deal with Mug Root Beer.

A relic of the 90s and early 2000s, AOL ending its dial-up internet service AOL, an internet pioneer that brought millions of Americans online for the first time, is discontinuing its dial-up service next month. AOL posted a statement saying it “routinely evaluates its products and has decided to discontinue Dial-up Internet” on September 30, ending more than three decades of operations. A relic of the 90s and early 2000s, AOL ending its dial-up internet service

Masked thieves stole about $7,000 worth of Labubu dolls from a Los Angeles-area store on Wednesday, according to the Associated Press. The Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department are investigating the incident.

Hundreds of prisoners from the Nebraska State Penitentiary were displaced after a violent storm damaged two housing units on Saturday, according to the Nebraska Department of Correctional Services. No injuries were reported, the department said.

Paris is no stranger to tourists taking photos of its historic landmarks. Tourists taking photos of themselves in front of the landmarks for social media? Well, that’s changed the game. As the French capital sees a surge in international tourism, CNN’s Melissa Bell spoke with locals in Montmartre who told CNN they worry that the large crowds are leading to the “Disney-fication” of their neighborhood.

Meet the oldest panda living outside of China At 35 years old, Xin Xin is a legend as the oldest giant panda living outside of China. CNN's Valeria León visited Mexico City's Chapultepec Park Zoo – where Xin Xin lives – to see why thousands of people visit the panda each day. Meet the oldest panda living outside of China

See what happens when a robot competes with courting fiddler crabs Researchers test fiddler crab mating strategies by introducing a robot with a waving claw, dubbed “Wavy Dave.” CNN speaks to one of the scientists about the study and some surprising moments caught on camera. See what happens when a robot competes with courting fiddler crabs

Videos and photos show dinosaur footprints uncovered in the Sandy Creek area in Travis County, Texas following the catastrophic July 4th floods. Experts say the creek where the prints were found is usually dry but rose to 20 feet during the floods, and that the prints are approximately 110 to 115 million years old.

Videos show a hole in a broken water slide on the Royal Caribbean's Icon of the Seas cruise ship. Acrylic glass broke as a guest passed through the slide. A spokesperson said in a statement to CNN that the guest is being treated for injuries.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have extended their deal with Netflix to continue producing films and television shows for the streaming service. The couple's 2020 deal was set to expire later this year. Taylor Swift announced her latest album "The Life of a Showgirl" on Travis and Jason Kelce's podcast "New Heights". The World's Ugliest Dog Contest named Petunia won $5,000 and a merchandise deal with Mug Root Beer. Meanwhile, AOL is ending its dial-up internet service, which brought millions of Americans online for the first time. Masked thieves stole about $7,000 worth of Labubu dolls from a Los Angeles-area store. The oldest giant panda living outside of China, Xin Xin, was named the oldest in the world at 35 years old.
shortSummary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle extended their Netflix deal, while AOL ends its dial-up service, Petunia wins the World's Ugliest Dog Contest and Jennifer Lopez disables an uninvited guest.

argos_summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have extended their Netflix deal to continue producing content, which was set to expire soon. Taylor Swift announced her new album on a podcast, potentially hinting at her relationship with Travis Kelce. In other news, a lightning strike caused power outages in South Carolina, and a hairless bulldog named Petunia won the World's Ugliest Dog Contest in California.
